reviewText: The ultimate Andreas Bethmann meisterwerke in the EYES WIDE SHUT vein ... one of the best of the German gore-fests.

This seldom-seen sexploitation movie focuses primarily on a woman who goes on a killing spree after finding her male lover with another woman.  Although you may be able to rationalize her initial rage against her mate and the object of his immediate desire, the subsequent sex acts followed by stabbings and mutilation provided no real continuity to the storyline.  Despite jumping from one sex-then-kill episode to another with only brief plot interjections, the explicit sex and graphic gore came across as somewhat tame even by 2003 standards.  The acting, film work, and editing were all less-than-professional, and with a run time of 2 hours and 35 minutes, it was unnecessarily long and drawn-out. Frankly, there are much better choices on which to spend your time and money!
